abstract: Kurdish politician Selahattin Demirtas, who was once rising star in Turkish politics, has found himself scrambling to try and end war between Turkey and Kurdistan Workers' Party; Demirtas's Peoples' Democratic Party will face voters at polls again in November after entering Parliament for first time in last elections, and war threatens to erode his party's support.
lead_paragraph: Just two months ago, Selahattin Demirtas was basking in the afterglow of his party’s historic election showing. Now, he will have to face the voters again.

headline.main: A Kurdish Political Star in Turkey Confronts Escalating Violence
headline.print_headline: A Rising Kurdish Political Star in Turkey Confronts Escalating Unrest

snippet: Just two months ago, Selahattin Demirtas was basking in the afterglow of his party’s historic election showing. Now, he will have to face the voters again.
